Invocation Name: bye buddy
des:
It's me..!! Your Bye Buddy!!! 

Isn't it cool, if there is always some Buddy to say Bye to you with a positive note every-time you say Bye and offer you a pleasant musical mood!! The day started positive is an opportunity to make a huge difference and have big impact in everyone's lives! Bye Buddy always wishes you to be positive! Now Bye Buddy also provides you seasonal greetings and shows her kindness by wishing you stay healthy quotes during uncertain times! 

Whoever you are, whatever your age is, never mind!! Here comes your Bye Buddy! You can always leave home with happy Bye or surprise your kids or friends with a cool bye when you say Bye Buddy to me!!

As Alexa playing one of the key role being part of family all day long, helping most of our daily routines, why not we start saying Bye to her whenever we step out of home, wouldn't it be great if she says a happy bye with a positive note in Alexa's way and voice??

Do you and your family want a Cool Bye everyday and every-time!! It's so simple!!

Step 1: Enable the Alexa Skill - "Bye Buddy"
Step 2: Just say "Bye Buddy"
Step 3: Hear Alexa saying cool bye with a positive note followed by a mild music; If you own a device with display, along with hearing, you can see a positive note with a cool Background.

In headless devices, After enabling Bye Buddy skill to Alexa, whenever you say "Bye buddy" she will say "Bye Bye Buddy!! followed by a positive note and a pleasant music" In screened devices, After enabling Bye Buddy skill to Alexa, whenever you say "Bye buddy" she will say "Bye Bye Buddy!! followed by a positive note along with a pleasant music and Background image with the note displayed on it.

Moreover "Bye Buddy" can say Bye to you or your kids, even you can make her say Bye to your friends too!! You will be surprised to hear and see, there is a buddy to say Bye Bye always with a positive note followed by a mild music and make your day an awesome start.

Want to enjoy Bye Buddy? Just start saying,
Alexa, "Bye Buddy"
Alexa, "Launch Bye Buddy"
Alexa, "Open Bye Buddy"
Alexa, "Open Bye Buddy and say Goodbye!"
Alexa, "Ask Bye Buddy to say Bye to my friend or kid or him..."
Alexa, "Ask Bye Buddy to say Bye"

Kindly leave your ratings and reviews which would be helpful in shaping Bye Buddy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
